vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ki.17.31
§ Adrammelech = "honour of the king" or "Adar is prince" or "Adar is Counsellor, Decider"
1) an idol or god of the Sepharvites, introduced to Israel by Shalmaneser the fifth
2) the son and murderer of Sennacherib
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   dios de Sefarvaim; (b)   hijo de Senaquerib, rey de Asiria
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞得米勒 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "王的榮耀" 或 "亞達珥是君王" 或 "亞達珥是策士, 決定勝負的人"
1) 西法瓦音的偶像或神, 由亞述王撒縵以色五世引進以色列 (王下 17:31)
2) 西拿基立的兒子, 後來殺了西拿基立 (王下 19:37; 賽 37:38)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚得米勒 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "王的荣耀" 或 "亚达珥是君王" 或 "亚达珥是策士, 决定胜负的人"
1) 西法瓦音的偶像或神, 由亚述王撒缦以色五世引进以色列 (王下 17:31)
2) 西拿基立的儿子, 后来杀了西拿基立 (王下 19:37; 赛 37:38)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.19.37;
son of: Sennacherib (H5576);
brother of: Sharezer (H8272) and Esarhaddon (H0634)
§ Adrammelech = "honour of the king" or "Adar is prince" or "Adar is Counsellor, Decider"
1) an idol or god of the Sepharvites, introduced to Israel by Shalmaneser the fifth
2) the son and murderer of Sennacherib
